Name: Welcome to Heyday Island!
Goal: Go to Central City and speak to Thomas
Objetivo: Ve a Ciudad Central y habla con Thomas

Name: The beach dressmaker
Goal: Catch a Krabby and give it to the dressmaker
Objetivo: Captura un Krabby y dáselo al modista
FinalEng: Go to the Port on Saturday!

Name: Investigating Team Rocket
Goal: Bring proofs against Team Rocket to the police
Objetivo: Recolecta pruebas contra el Team Rocket
FinalEng: Go to Police Office in Central City!

Name: First Rocket takeoff
FinalEsp: ¡Ve a la guarida secreta del Team Rocket!
FinalEng: Go to the Team Rocket's secret lair!

Name: A gangster in Maritime City
Goal: Investigate Maritime City in the night
FinalEsp: ¡Lleva las pruebas al policía de Ciuad Marítima!
FinalEng: Bring the proofs to Maritime City's policeman!

Name: Family meeting
Objetivo: Encuentra a los hermanos de Micaelo
FinalEng: Attend the reunion in Maritime City!

Name: A...friend? in love
Goal: Get information about the bench girl
Objetivo: Obten información de la chica del banco
FinalEsp: ¡Habla con el chico en Ciudad Marítima!
FinalEng: Speak with the guy in Maritime City!
